questions_and_notes: Since the description says "on the land portion of the grid cell", cell_methods should include "where land".  (Also make sure this remains consistent with wording for "monthly" sampled variable.) Note that "where land" means the fraction of the land portion of the cell, not the portion of the cell.
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
comment: Percentage of each grid cell that is occupied by snow that rests on land portion of cell.
